H0.text: What's the name of the intelligent talking horses in Swift's Gulliver's Travels . Equinus

H1.text: What's the name of the intelligent talking horses in Swift's Gulliver's Travels . Corvini

H2.text: What's the name of the intelligent talking horses in Swift's Gulliver's Travels . Hippolytos

H3.text: What's the name of the intelligent talking horses in Swift's Gulliver's Travels . Hwinham

A4.text: The intelligent horses are called Houyhnhnms.

A5.text: In the land of the Houyhnhnms, he finds rational horses living peacefully alongside savage human-like creatures called Yahoos.

A6.text: Yahoo (Gulliver's Travels), creatures found in the book Gulliver's Travels by Jonathan Swift
